sentences.sentence: They are truly lumps of nebular matter, probably similar in composition to the matter from which planets were assembled.
sentences.translation: 它们的确是星云物质组成的团块，其组成物质可能与行星形成时的物质相似。

sentences.sentence: At one time it was thought that these matrix grains might be pristine nebular dust, the sort of stuff from which chondrules and inclusions were made.
sentences.translation: 曾经有人认为，这些基质颗粒可能是原始的星云尘埃，即形成陨石球粒及其内含物的物质。

sentences.sentence: Ultraviolet radiation from the hot star powers the nebular glow.
sentences.translation: 热恒星的紫外辐射使星云发光。
